choices: Help the police with an investigation
Cure myself of my ticklishness
Take some time off with my family
Attend the school dance
Visit my aunt
1.content:
Once upon a time, there lived a girl, just a normal kid from a small town like you or me.
There was nothing extraordinary about little Summer, save for two things:
she had a head on her shoulders smarter than any of the other kids in her town, and soles on her that were also more ticklish than anyone's.

She suffered many defeats and much humiliation at the hands of various evildoers because of this (not the least at those of her younger sister Mouse, who loved to exploit her sister's weakness).

But all good stories eventually come to a happy ending.
Summer's day in the limelight came at last after she solved the notorious mystery of the haunted Featherton Manor that had plagued the residents of Hollering Heights for decades, and stopped the nefarious Clown Prince behind the disappearances of the town's youth.

Summer's talent in investigations finally became known to the world (and, after that, even to her parents), and all of the adults in her hometown knew of her and loved her.

Well...all but one person...
...
"Summer Salt, always Summer Salt!" shouted Chief Bullroc, head of the Hollering Heights Police Department (Ha-Ha PD).
"What does SHE have that I don't? We work hard every day to protect their safety and yet THIS girl is the one who gets all the attention for solving just a single crime!"

Sergeant Littlefinger, his assistant, who was better natured and worked for HaHaPD for shorter than her boss, did not comment, just pointed at the station's television's screen.
"I believe that's her, having an interview with Hollering Heights Community Channel."
The chief's jaw dropped.

The familiar figure of the girl detective was standing next to a hyperactive reporter.

"I'm standing here in front of HH Public Library with our own amazing Summer Salt!
Miss Salt, everybody is talking about your brave accomplishment after you entered the spoooky Featherton Manor!
Did you know that the previous police chief proved that the ghost was an urban hoax?
But you proved that there WAS a ghost! Summer, how do you feel about that?"

"I just wish I knew why everyone always wants to tickle me."

"Capital! What a comeback! So, let me ask you the one question that is probably on the minds of all of our viewers! Are your feet really that ticklish?"

"Oh yes. Excessively."

"What would you do if I touched them now?"

"I would kick you in the face and then have you fired."

But Chief Bullroc wan't the only one watching Summer's interview with malicious interest on this day!
Somewhere far off, a nefarious figure also had their eyes glued to the television screen with interest.
Was it the revengeful Clown Prince observing his arch-enemy?
Was it the Maharaja of Tinglingstan whose slave-girl traffic Summer had crushed during a previous adventure?
Or one of her numerous other villains?
"So, Summer Salt is about to announce her plans publicly...What a great opportunity to finally get my revenge! Wherever she goes, she better be prepared, for I will be waiting! Wa-ha ha! Mu-ha-ha!"

Oblivious to this, the charming Summer and her interviewer were just about to conclude the broadcast.

"So, one last secret for our viewers." The reporter said. "What's next for Summer Salt?"

"Hmm. Well, the next thing I think I'll do is..."
1.title: A new adventure begins!

choices: Camping!
To the mountains!
To the sea!
To the countryside!
Other...
13.content:
Tick tock...

Susan Salt wished really hard (using a magic chant she learned from her friends at school the other day) for time to hurry faster. The old grandfather clock across the room was right now her chosen enemy. Until it struck 1 o'clock, she would be nailed to the couch.

She tried to a backwards somersault, to pass the time. Failing that, she chewed her hair, then she put both feet behind her neck. The cats were watching her with interest.

She loathed being babysat by Ms. Hobbs, but over time developed a sort of wariness of her.
It was the way the senile old bat never seemed to notice anything Mouse did. Mouse was used to being caught and rather banked on adults' predictable reactions. But the way Ms. Hobbs just never noticed her attempts caused Mouse to be deeply suspicious of her.

Ms. Hobbs actually only knew of one way to deal with kids. She sat her down on her couch, and gave her horrible ancient imported chocolate cookies to eat. Mouse rebelled the first couple of times and fled the couch, but in time she became quite docile. It was no accident that the Salts kept choosing her as her babysitter.
It was probably the fascination that Ms. Hobbs would go through the same motions each time, regardless of the result she got.
In Mouse's mind, it was long decided that Ms. Hobbs was a witch, and Mouse was determined to find her out and catch the moment when she drops her mask.

The old woman sat motionless in her armchair in front of the old clock.
Mouse was watching her like a hawk.
Half a dozen cats were doing the same.

After ten minutes of being intensely monitored, she suddenly spoke.
"Ah...I believe it is time to feed Mitzi."
Mouse perked up. She rather liked Mitzi who was one of the old lady's gentler cats.
"Ah...On the other hand, I'll feed her. You feed Mr. Tibbles."
Tibbles the old tomcat stared at Mouse through his one good eye, with a pose that suggested bloodshed and murder and the loss of at least one arm if somebody tried to stroke it and call it "cute kitty".

Mouse hesitantly took one of the bowls Ms. Hobbs brought in, and pushed it in front of Tibbles.

Just as the old tabby threw itself at the food, the phone rang.
Mouse.snatched it greedily before Ms. Hobbs could even identify where the noise was coming from.

"Susan dear, it's mom. Can you please say goodbye to your babysitter and..."
Mouse darted to the door like a bullet.
"Bye old hag!" she shouted back to a flustered Ms. Hobbs. "I'm leaving! Summer's coming back home!"

"Eh? What did she say? Summer's coming back? I better close the drapes!"

---
Summer entered through the front gate to find Mouse jump into her arms.
"You're back!" she stated. "How was it?
Ooh, you'll NEVER guess where dad had planned the family holiday!"
"Oh no, you don't say..."
"Yes!"
13.title: Ms. Hobbs' uneventful day

choices: Summer
Summer's mom
Other options or things to do
133.content:
The two Salt sisters, their parents, as well as Jamie and Chris, after an hour-long drive, all pour out onto the beach to enjoy a nice swimsuit & bikini summer holiday.

Naturally, this is a great opportunity to bury someone in the sand and tickle their soles :3

Should it be:
133.title: To the sea!

choices: Running into some other friends/enemies from school or back at home
Tickle fight while chilling at the beach house and stuff
More
1333.title: Other options or things to do

choices: That b*tch Margaret and some lackies
Sports club guys (Michael and Cloe) looking for some challengers
More...
13331.title: Running into some friends/enemies from school

choices: "Oh, they are called Jamie and Chris."
"Oh, they couldn't come."
"They'll be joining us later."
133311.content:
"C'mon Summer, let me bury you." Mouse insisted, chasing after her sister.
"No way, there's no way you can convince me to let you tickle-torture me already on the first day we arrived." Summer dodged her pestering with a laugh.

They very nearly bumped into a group of other girls coming from the other direction from towards the beach house.
Leading them was a familiar face...

"Well, well, if it isn't little Summer and the Scooby Gang."

Summer groaned. The worst possible thing to happen, had just happened.
"Margaret. What are YOU doing here."

"Just enjoying a holiday with my girlfriends? You and your little pals can-"

"Wait."
The girl next to her held up a hand, silencing her.
"-I- want to talk to her."

"See, D., she's the girl I've been talking about, the..."
"Yeah, yeah."
"If you listen to me" Margaret whispered. "I could tell you about some of her weak points-"
"Shut up, Marge."

She was watching the detective quartet with interest.

Summer knew she had to pay special attention to this one.
The girl had long raven black hair and hazel brown skin that made the other girls' tan blush with shame. She was sexy without apparent effort. (But Summer knew how much effort it took to look THIS natural.)

Margaret's swimsuit showed a lot of skin too, but her pale white freckled skin and failed attempts to control the shape of her hair seemed juvenile and desperate next to this girl's beauty.

She offered them a hand.
"I'm Desiderata. But you may call me Desiree."

Summer didn't take it. She put it back on her waist and glanced around like she didn't notice.

"So you are Margaret's friends. My parents own the holiday house up on the hill. How'd you like to be called over for a sleepover?"
She suppressed a yawn so fake she didn't even bother taking the deep breath.

"Um, I don't know, we're staying here with our parents, they'll probably say..."
"Good. Don't be late."

They marched off.

"Well that settles it." Chris said. "You know Margaret. This HAS to be a trap."

"I don't know" Jamie said. "We don't know that girl yet. She didn't act like she was Margaret's friend for real. Maybe she just genuinely wanted to talk."
"Or to show off." Chris mumbled.

Summer decided to...Oh whatever, you know this is going to end with her attending even though she shouldn't right? :p

Summer arrived. The holiday house was indeed large. There didn't seem to be a very sleepover or party mood when she entered though. Five girls just sulking around on couches and bar chairs, including Margaret who was sitting in an armchair in a corner and in a bad mood.

"Summer! How nice of you to have come."
Desiree came down the stairs wearing pajamas that looked too expensive to be used for that purpose.
"And your friends are..?"
133311.title: That b*tch Margaret and her girlfriends

choices: Pao Ting!
Jimmy and Iris, siblings who are Summer's biggest fans from her school!
Someone else?
133313.content: Who else could it be?
133313.title: Who else could be at the beach?

choices: Summer agrees, and the group proceeds to restrain Pao-Ting and tickle her!
Summer disagrees, they shouldn't just do that if Pao didn't do anything bad.
Pao-Ting suddenly makes an offer! She will tell them if Summer kisses her foot!
1333131.content:
"Pao Ting?!" Summer exclaimed seeing the chinese genius girl on the beach as well
The chinese girl, hearing her name spoken turned towards Summer and her friends.
"Are you spying on us or something?!" Jamie spoke
"How typical of those with lesser intellect to assume that I have no life outside of proving my superiority to you lot." Pao Ting said calmly, flicking her long black hair like a snooty noblewoman

"What are you doing here then?" Summer asked with suspicion
"Is it really so surprising that even someone like me would like to take a day off on the beach?" Asked Pao Ting sarcastically
"Yes." Summer and her friends said in unison
"Well that's just rude of you, but whatever. I don't have to tell you everything about myself do I? All you need to know is that it doesn't concern you." The chinese girl replied dismissively

"Hey, we have an advantage of numbers, why not just tickle the answers out of her?" Jamie whispered to Summer
1333131.title: Pao Ting on the beach.

choices: Summer decides to swallow her pride and kiss Pao Ting's foot.
Summer pretends to kiss Pao Ting's foot, but then starts to tickle it!
Summer decides it doesn't matter what Pao Ting is doing here, and just leaves.
13331313.content:
"But..." Pao Ting starts, suddenly turning the group's attention back to herself again"Since you seem so interested in my business, I can tell you... under one condition." Said the chinese girl, a smirk appearing on her face
"What is it?" Asked Summer
"If you kneel down and kiss my foot Summer Salt, I will tell you the reason I am here today." Said Pao Ting, pointing towards her feet which were currently clad in sandals

"What?!" Summer said in surprise, not expecting such a weird condition
"You must be kidding!" Said Jamie
"Weird!" Commented Mouse

"Well then, if you aren't going to do that I will be on my way..." Said Pao Ting teasingly, she knew Summer wouldn't like to get potentially interesting information pass her up like that, but would she really humiliate herself before her rival to achieve that?
13331313.title: A little humiliation worth of information?

choices: "...we are going with you!" Summer and friends join Pao Ting in her search
"...we are gonna find them first!" Summer and others start case without Pao Ting
Pao Ting wants revenge and almost instantly pounces on Summer to tickle her!
133313132.content:
Summer then started slowly walking towards Pao Ting. Making it seem as if she really was going to give in to the chinese genius.
"Seriously Summer?" Jamie asked with some doubt
Summer quickly turned to her friends, and gave them a wink, implying that she had a plan.

"So you are finally going to give me the respect I deserve." Said Pao Ting, extending her sandal clad foot in Summer's direction
The amateur sleuth then kneeled before her rival, she could see Pao Ting victoriously grinning above her. She grabbed the chinese girl's pretty elegant foot, and proceeded to remove the sandal. It felt really soft to the touch, Pao Ting clearly took care of her feet.

Summer then pretended to get her head closer to the chinese girl's foot, as if about to kiss it. But just as her lips were about to touch the skin on chinese girl's foot, Summer moved back and started moving her fingers all over Pao Ting's sole!

The chinese genius didn't expect sudden turn like that, Summer's sudden tickle attack caused her to burst out laughing and fall on her butt onto the sand.
"HAHAHAHA HOHOHOW DAHAHAHARE YOHOHOHOU!" Pao Ting mumbled between her laughs as Summer kept holding her foot and moving her nails onto her pampered sole.

"You really thought I would just kiss your foot like that? Now if you want me to stop, you will just tell me what are you doing here!"Said Summer continuing her ticklish assault on chinese genius' foot
She already knew Pao Ting's weak spots, ever since their earlier encounter at Featherton Manor, her arch and space right under the toes. It didn't take her long to make Pao Ting go almost into hysterics, just from tickling one foot like that.

"FIIHIHIINE YOHOHOHOU BAHAHAHARBAHAHARIAN!" The chinese girl finally said between her laughs
Hearing that Summer temporarily stopped her ticklish assault, but still kept holding chinese girl's foot.
"Well then, what is it you are doing here?" Summer asked, teasingly moving her fingers just in front of Pao Ting's foot, showing she is ready to restart tickling at any moment

"I was... looking for... thieves..."Says the chinese girl still trying to regain her breath
"Thieves? Why would you be looking for them..." Asked Summer
"I ordered a very powerful Toutai Tikari processor, which I need to build my newest invention, a portable supercomputer able to equal the Sunway TaihuLight*. However the transport was inflitrated at night, and robbed by unknown assailants... and as far as I know the thieves are hiding somewhere near this area." Pao Ting explained after finally regaining her breath after the tickle session
"Can't you just order another one? It's not like your family can't afford it." Said Summer
"Having another one commissioned would take too long. And it's a matter of honor, no lowly thief can steal from me and get away with it!" Said Pao Ting
"Maybe we could help her!" Said Mouse all of a sudden
"Seriously?!" Chris, Jamie and Summer said in unison
"I mean if we don't stop them those thieves are going to steal from more people! Are we just going to leave it like that?"Mouse said, despite her words, she probably just wanted to go on another adventure with Summer and friends.

Mouse had a point though. What detective would Summer be if she knowingly allowed a band of thieves keep stealing?

"You would just get in my way. Now would you kindly let go of my foot already? Or you are so mesmerized by how pretty it is that you can't stop admiring it?" Pao Ting said in annoyed tone
"Fine fine... geez" Summer said and let go of the chinese girl's foot while wondering about what should she do
"Now if you excuse me, I have some thieves to take care of and shipment to get back." Said the chinese girl, getting up from the sand
"Wait a second Pao Ting..."Summer started



*It's actually the name of real fastest supercomputer in the world! And who said you can't learn anything from a tickle fetish story? XD
133313132.title: Pao Ting's ticklish interrogation!

choices: Summer picks Jamie(Female) to go with her
Summer picks Chris(Female) to go with her
She picks one of them, but they are male.
1333131321.content:
"... we are going with you!" Summer said finally
Pao Ting, as well as Jamie and Chris, all seemed surprised by her sudden decision.
"Didn't I tell you that I won't need any help? Find yourself something better to do." The chinese girl finally said
"You sure? I just single-handedly took you down a moment ago. Do you think you will do much better against multiple adversaries?" Summer said
Pao Ting blushed a bit, either from anger or humiliation, she knew that Summer had a point there. Even though she had some useful gadgets with her, if one of the thieves managed to surprise her, she would definitely be in trouble. It was unlikely that someone as smart as her of course would let herself be surprised... but it was a possibility nonetheless.

"Fine! You can go." Pao Ting told Summer "But they have to stay, especially that little sister of yours! I don't want to end up tickled, or worse by some savages just because she pushes wrong button out of curiousity or something!"
"I agree that Mouse shouldn't go... but I don't trust you enough to want to be left alone with you without Chris and Jamie."Said Summer
"And how can I trust you? You can gang up on me later, and take my processor once I get it back"Said Pao Ting
"If you really bought it through legal means then I won't take it from you."Said Summer
"Let's do it like this then. We will split in two groups, one, composed of your sister and one of those two will stay here at the beach and in case we get captured will inform authorities. Other group will be me, you and the other one of those two. We will go into the base of those thieves and recover my shipment." Pao Ting finally explained
"Not fair! I want to go into the thief base too!" Complained Mouse
"Be quiet Mouse, it's not a place for kids!" Said Summer and then turned to Pao Ting"Alright, but how will we keep in contact with the other group?"
"I have a second communicator built into a multifunctional watch like mine, I will give it to the person who stays here. Just don't break it! It's probably worth more than all of your homes combined!" Said Pao Ting pointing at a watch she had
"Why did you have two if you planned to go alone?"Summer questioned
"It would make no sense to have just one if they are supposed to be able to connect to each other, right?" Said the chinese girl, looking away for a moment, as if trying to hide something
"That's not really what I asked for..." Said Summer
"Well, if you have no more questions, decide who should go with us and I will give the watch to other person." Said Pao Ting, clearly getting impatient already
1333131321.title: Joining forces?

choices: They go inside, and start sneaking around the underground base
Before they enter, they are surrounded by a bunch of guards!
Pao Ting goes in first, and gets captured by a guard!(Switch to her perspective)
13331313211.content:
Some time later...

"I still can't believe we are really working with her..." Said Jamie to Summer as they followed Pao Ting towards the place where she pinpointed the thief hideout would be
"We have a common goal, for the most part at least. So we can call temporary truce like that." Summer said
"I can hear you two, you know? I don't like working with those inferior intelectually either, but you had a point before when saying that it's dangerous to go alone."Said Pao Ting

While they were moving along, Jamie couldn't stop herself from looking towards chinese girl's sandal-clad feet from time to time... she might have been kind of a bitch to deal with, but her feet were certainly beautiful. She just hoped that neither Summer nor Pao Ting herself will notice that.

Finally they all found themselves at the end of the beach... yet there was still no visible place where thieves could be hiding.
"Could it be that you were wrong about place where they were?" Jamie said towards Pao Ting
"Nonsense! I am 100% sure their hideout is somewhere nearby... let's just search the surroundings." Said the chinese girl, looking offended at suggestion she could have been wrong

They spent about 20 minutes, looking around the beach, and in the more shallow areas of the sea... until finally Summer felt something solid under the sand where she stepped on! After quickly digging a bit down there, it turned out that there was some kind of entrance underground there!
"Jamie, Pao Ting! I think I've got it!" She yelled

"Who knew, so she was correct after all."Said Jamie
"Of course I was! Now let's get it open..."Said Pao Ting and together with Summer and Jamie they lifted the hatch, revealing a ladder leading down
13331313211.title: Summer picks Jamie(Female) to go with her

choices: Ninja girl tickles Pao Ting's feet with her fingers
Ninja girl tickles Pao Ting's feet by licking them
Switch to Summer and Jamie's perspective as they inflitrate the base.
133313132113.content:
Despite being a genius, Pao Ting, wanting to be done with the matter as soon as possible, decided to go down the ladder first, without even checking if it's safe. It didn't take long before she heard ominous "Look who we have here..." behind herself, and then everything went black...

The chinese girl then woke up tied to a chair, her legs stretched out in front of her, and her feet locked in stocks. She was also gagged, she wasn't sure with what, but it left a weird kinda salty taste in her mouth.
"Well well... looks like my uninvited guest decided to wake up."Said a feminine voice
Pao Ting turned around, looking for the source of the voice, finally noticing that the speaker was an asian girl with a long hair tied in a ponytail, about her own age, who had just entered the room.
"To be honest I expected the genius inventor Pao Ting to be more of a challenging target..." The girl said smugly
Pao Ting could do nothing but look as the girl was slowly walking towards her stocked feet
"You can call me Kurai. I'm a thief, as you probably already guessed. Not in it for the money though, I just like the thrill and the challenge of difficult jobs. I suspected you wouldn't just leave that processor I stole from you alone... but as it turns out you were surprisingly easy to capture! Did you really think we wouldn't have a camera watching the entrance to the base? Perhaps you aren't that much of a genius after all?" The asian girl continued, as Pao Ting was getting increasingly angry, and also worried what was she going to do

"By the way, how are you liking my sock? You didn't bring your own so I had to gag you with mine, hope my sweat is to your liking!" Kurai teases the genius chinese girl further.

Despite her currently increased disgust from the taste in her mouth, Pao Ting noticed that the girl's outfit was very reminiscent of typical clothes worn by Japanese ninja. Whether she and other thieves were real ones, or just crazy fans of anime she couldn't tell from just that though.
"Now... what kind of host would I be, if I didn't provide my guest with some entertainment?" Said Kurai quickly dragging one of her fingernails on length of one of Pao Ting's soles, causing the chinese girl to jerk from the ticklish feeling

"Your soft pampered feet sure seem sensitive... this is gonna be fun." The ninja girl said as she eyed the chinese girl's bare feet carefully.
133313132113.title: Pao Ting's capture by ninja thieves!

choices: Pao Ting's wish comes true! The ninja girl is suddenly knocked out by Summer!
One of the underlings interrupts the torture to report something!
Kurai makes it even worse for Pao Ting, by making a cat lick her other foot
1333131321132.content:
"I have heard that you often demand your enemies to kiss your feet once you win against them... but I wonder have you ever had them licked?" Said the ninja girl teasingly while sitting on the floor just next to Pao Ting's feet
Pao Ting's eyes grew wide, she didn't, having someone's saliva on her feet seemed like a rather gross concept, so she always limited herself to demanding massages and kisses. During her brief cooperation with Clown Prince in Featherton Manor, she seen some of his clown girls lick feet of their victims... it seemed to tickle quite a lot.
"Let's see now..." Kurai said before sticking out her tongue and taking a quick lick of chinese girl's sole.
Her slimy with saliva tongue tickled as expected, causing Pao Ting to let out a laugh through the sock gagging her
"That's the reaction I like!" Said Kurai and immediately took a few more licks, quickly alternating between both of Pao Ting's feet, making the chinese girl let out even more laughs. The ninja girl didn't even seem to mind some leftover sand from the beach as her tongue moved all over the soft pampered soles of Pao Ting, she relentlessly lapped away at them and enjoyed seeing the chinese genius thrash around in the stocks, unable to escape her skillful licking. Yet at the same time, in the corner of Pao Ting's mind, there was a slight feeling of pleasure... perhaps if the licking was more gentle, it could actually be enjoyable... not that she really wanted to or even could feel pleased in current situation.

After few minutes of that, Kurai stopped for a moment. Pao Ting was already starting to feel tired, her face red from humiliation, anger and tiredness all at the same time.
"Don't tell me you are already tired? I didn't have time to play with those cute little toes of yours yet!" Said the ninja girl
Pao Ting tried to angrily threaten her torturer but obviously couldn't because of her gag.
"Someone is very eager to have her toes played with I see!" Kurai said, and started licking away at undersides of Pao Ting's toes!
It was even worse than the soles, the area right under her toes as well as inbetween them were her most sensitive spots, and feeling Kurai's slimy tongue quickly moving under and inbetween like that, quickly made Pao Ting go into hysterics, with tears forming in her eyes as the ninja girl mercilessly kept her tongue assault on her toes

Pao Ting possibly for the first time in her life really hoped that Summer would show up here, and save her. She realized the absurdity of wanting her arch-rival to help... but at this point she would do anything to get out of her current situation.
1333131321132.title: Pao Ting's foot-licking torture

choices: Spy on Margaret
Search around the river
Spy on the parents
134.content:
"Why do we keep being dragged back to this place!
The first two times were already more than enough!"

The car slowly passed the big wooden sign that said "ALLSPICE FARMS".

"Well, apparently Dad was low on money and Mr. Allspice wanted to show that there was no bad blood between them, so..."

"Oh look, this girl. I can't believe that she still couldn't have been eaten by vampires yet."
A girl in a straw hat seemed to be waiting for them. She was known to the Salt sisters, though unusually, her face now had a hint of make-up on it.

"Margaret."
"Hello, o Queen of Dorks."
"Hello, o Princess of Bitches." Summer retorted.

That seemed to be it.
They stood next to each other in silence.
There really wasn't much else to say.

Margaret and Summer had that odd, cringingly intimate relationship that you get when two people's immediate
dislike towards each other - through years of hard work - is carefully fostered into mutual burning hatred. The kind where you are forced to learn all about the other down to their deepest secrets AGAINST YOUR WILL, but in the end mutual pride, indebtedness, and one side's predictable good nature (and also because both sides have already used up all of their gunpowder long ago) forces you into a stalemate.

And so, even though both girls secretly fantasized about the other dying a slow premature death, once they were left with no choice they would actually get on quite well, provided you forced them together with the power of a thousand magnets that neither could escape. Oh...and you didn't listen to the words.

"So" Summer initiated conversation, suppressing a yawn. "I suppose there isn't another mystery or something you need solved again THIS time or...?"

"There is one."
It was an emotionless, uninvested statement indicating no "please" or "thanks". Summer was here and there was a mystery so she'd solve it whether you wanted it or not.

"At the river." Margaret explained. "People have sighted some sort of kappa monster."

" 'Some sort of kappa monster'?" Margaret, if you opened a biology book once in a while..."

"Well, -I-'m sorry I did not attend genius rugrat school!"

"Why's your mouth painted?" Mouse emerged from below.
"None of your business."
"Could it be" Summer smirked. "A boy? Is our Margie settling down?"
"Eat a rake, Summer."
After a pause, she said.
"Look, dad set it up, okay? He's a nice boy, and..."
"So you won't be helping us hunt a kappa because you'l be busy smooching behind the barn?" Mouse inquired.
Margaret stared at her.
"Whatever." She walked off.

So, what will the sisters do?...
134.title: To the countryside!

choices: Some cloaked character grabbed them from behind
The floor gave and they fell down a secret hatch
The floor gave and they fell into one of the animal pens
1343.content:
"It is dark here. Summer, why are we hiding like this?"
"Mouse, shut UP..."
"I can't see. And the straw is tickling me."

The sisters were hiding among some sacks piled up on a railing in the barn, after Summer's suggestion to follow their parents and find out what they were doing. Fortunately, the two hadn't been spotted yet.
Summer decided to ignore the complaints of her younger sister. This was exciting. Why'd their father drag Mr. Allspice to talk privately to this old barn? Summer smelled a mystery.

"I've got no time for such things, Salt. If you keep bothering me with your obscure heathen fantasies..."

"Reginald, this is important. I've seen the signs. The time is imminent. The Seven must gather..."

Summer snapped Mouse's hand away.
"Ssh.
Stop fidgeting, you're gonna make us..."
1343.title: Spy on the parents

choices: ...He has a crush on you, right?
...She has a boyfriend?
...He has a girlfriend?
14.content:
"Eeh? What a boring option!"
"What was that?"
"Eh, I mean, capital! Have you heard, dear viewers? Our very own Summer's next investigation is going to be crashing the shool party...Er...Cut! Cut"

Summer (after she called her parents, and assured them that she was safe and was going to be home soon) was overcome with a sense of melancholy as she wandered through the twilight-illuminated town.
So much had happened these past months, and she and her friends have learned so much.
With all the recognition she got recently, a nagging thought started growing in the back of her mind...
Were these happy days going to continue forever? Sooner or later, something was going to happen and it would all end...

She was glad when a sharp cry snapped her out of her reverie.
"Suuuumm-eer~"
and she noticed Jamie's figure waving from the other side of the road. Her friend was in their best Saturday clothes, and grasped her hands with joy. They walked next to each other for a while, which strangely felt weird. Summer noticed that Jamie...looked sadder than usual. Suddenly her friend spoke up
"Summer, we should talk, girl to..er, like best friends."

"W-what is it?" she asked, wondering why she was sounding embarrassed.

"You know how we met a lot of people these past months...made a lot of new friends..."
"Yeah..."
Jamie suddenly grabbed her hands.
"And that's why!"
"Jamie, what?"
"I'm saying that you should choose someone!"
"Wha-Whaaaa?" she checked mentally that her friend was really saying what she thought she heard. "Jamie, we're still way too young for...I mean, it's not even our own school dance yet..."

"That's exactly why! Do you think there's always going to be more time to pick? Eventually you are going to realize that these school days have gone by and you never once went on a date or walked to school with your crush or...or..."

"But...But...I don't even know anyone who'd...I mean, there's this upperclassman that always tries to ask me to places but he's not really, like..."

"Summer."
"Yes."
"You're super popular. With that interview, you're going to be even more popular. You have to grab this chance! Consider Chris!"

Chris? What Chris? What happened to Chris?

"What's with Chris?" Summer asked, suddenly worried.
"Oh, nothing, nothing bad. It's just, you know that...
14.title: "Attending the school dance."

choices: "Actually...I like you, too..."
"I was actually an enemy in disguise! Mu-ha-ha!"
"It's not going to matter anymore, because..."
141.content:
"Ehh? I-I mean...ok, I guess there were times now and then when I thought that maybe he did...but c'mon Jamie, I was just being delusional! All we ever did together were normal things like hanging out or..."

"What about that time when we were in the mansion...And then that one time on the beach..."

"Er- I thought he was just acting polite, actually."

"Summer Salt, you really are the biggest dullard knucklehead I have ever had the chance to be best friends for life with. Promise me that you will not do any running off, no big Summer projects, no parties and most importantly: no sleuthing, okay? Until the you've resolved the situation with Chris."

"Err I'm not sure if I can..."

"Summer. Look at me. I've seen you defeat some the evilest men that could possibly exist. I saw you have your feet tickle-tortured to insanity and beyond and not even bat an eye afterwards. Of course you can do it."

Summer pursed her lips.
"...You're right." She looked at her friend with newfound respect. "Thank you, Jamie...You really are the best friend a girl can have."

Jamie laughed.
"Well, what are you waiting for?"

Summer stopped halfway through turning around.
"Only...no sleuthing...Couldn't it be no bathing, or..."

Jamie laughed out loud.
"Run off, you dork."

Jamie watched Summer's disappearing back

"Godspeed, Summer." Jamie sighed. "How could I ever tell you that..."
141.title: ...He has a crush on you, right?

choices: Jamie changes her mind and chooses to go after Summer!
Jamie decides to not go to the dance.(Perspective back to Summer)
Jamie is suddenly attacked from behind and captured by someone!
1411.content:
"Actually... I like you too." Jamie muttered to herself and shook her head as in disbelieving what she just said herself

It took Jamie few years of knowing the amateur sleuth girl to realize her true feelings. She noticed that she wasn't all that interested in boys around her. Instead whenever thinking of being close to someone, Summer was always coming to her mind. Who would have thought it would end that way when they first met in elementary school? Back then Jamie was a bit of a bully in her class, which obviously put her at odds with Summer who always wanted to be good and just. However after Summer helped clear her of false accusations by other classmates, they both became friends, and Jamie stopped bullying others, while also joining Summer's sleuthing team.

It didn't help that Jamie additionally had a bit of a foot fetish, which combined with Summer's soft ticklish soles was definitely adding to the attraction. Only thing keeping her from ever being honest with Summer about it was Chris. She would feel terrible to try taking Summer from someone who had feelings for her for so long... that and lingering doubt that Summer would be interested in other girls. That's why she felt a bit obliged to try having the two get together, perhaps that way the aching in her own heart would stop?

Still, a part of Jamie thought that what she just did was a mistake. Perhaps if she runs after Summer she will manage to catch up with her? But what then? Will she just confess all of a sudden? That would be really awkward... but on the other hand is there anything else she could do?
1411.title: Untold feelings

choices: Jamie warns Summer! Then masked strangers emerge from bushes and capture them!
Jamie decides to watch carefully, trying to find out what's fake Chris' agenda.
Jamie joins their talk, but pretends to not know that "Chris" is a fake...
14111.content:
With newfound determination Jamie decided to chase after Summer. She had to tell her about her feelings, if the amateur sleuth wasn't into girls or rejected her then so be it, but she had to at least try!

She ran after Summer, hoping to catch up to her before she meets with Chris. The thoughts in her head still going crazy from the whole situation she personally got herself into. If she didn't tell Summer to go meet Chris right now, then she wouldn't have to be so desperate now!

To her surprise however when she finally caught up so that she could see her, Summer was already talking to someone. Someone that looked like Chris... it made no sense though! Earlier that day she overheard Chris planning to surprise Summer in front of the school before the dance and invite her afterwards. It was possible they met on the way to school... but Chris' house was still much farther from there. Which meant that "Chris" standing here would have to be going the opposite direction than school.

Just to make sure however, Jamie took out her phone and sent a text message to Chris "Where are you?". Soon after she got a reply "In front of the school, waiting for Summer. Gonna invite her to dance with me! Why do you ask?", "Just wanted to check something." Jamie replied quickly, not having time to tell Chris about whole situation.
The "Chris" Summer was talking to now however, didn't even touch his phone during all of that. There was no doubt, whoever was talking to Summer there, wasn't real Chris. What should Jamie do about it though?
14111.title: Jamie goes after Summer!

choices: Summer and Jamie wake up tied in the driving van, with someone guarding them.
Summer and Jamie wake up tied in the driving van, alone in the back of it.
Summer and Jamie wake up in a cell, tied up to chairs!
141111.content:
"Summer watch out, this is not real Chris!" Jamie shouted while running towards her friend and the impostor
Summer instantly turned towards her running friend, but before she could say anything impostor Chris grabbed her from behind!

"Wha! Let me go you basta... hmph!"Said Summer, trying to get free but the fake Chris was surprisingly strong for someone of his figure, and interrupted her by putting his hand on her mouth
"Well well, seems like your friend there put an end to my little game..." Said the impostor
"Let her go or I am gonna make you regret you were ever born!" Said Chris angered by the view of Summer being held hostage like that
"Hey lady, what are we doing about that one?" The impostor said, clearly not directed to either Summer nor Jamie
"Take her with us too, we can't have witnesses." Said a female voice coming from nearby bushes
"Like hell you wi... guh!" At this moment Jamie felt sharp pain in the back of her head, and lost consciousness

Behind the now unconscious Jamie was standing a masked figure holding a baseball bat.
"Was hitting her with baseball bat really necessary? She was actually kinda pretty." Said the impostor
"Don't worry, she can take it. When I used to work for Clown Prince she actually managed to kick my ass with her bare hands." Said another female voice, coming from the masked figure
"Spirited one huh? Those are most fun." Commented the impostor Chris, still holding Summer who was desperately trying to free herself

"If you are done exchanging creepy comments would you kindly put those two in the van?" Says another female, this one wearing only sunglasses, emerging from nearby bushes
"Fine, fine ladyboss. Does that mean our deal is done?" Asks the impostor Chris
"Yes, you are free to get out of town after you put those two in the van." Said the female
"Awww... too bad, hoped I would get chance to tickle that one a bit for beating me up before." Said the female with baseball bat
"No, our cooperation ends here. Now put our little sleuth to sleep, then throw them in the van, and get outta here."Said the female who seemed to be the leader of the group

At that moment Summer had a chloroform soaked handkerchief put to her face, and with that her consciousness drifted away...
141111.title: Captured!

choices: The woman keeps tickling Jamie's foot until the van reaches destination
Summer intervenes, offering to be tickled instead of Jamie
Woman starts tickling Jamie somewhere else
1411111.content:
Summer and Jamie opened their eyes in a rather dark environment. Lit only by a weak light on the top. From the looks on it and sounds, they were in the back of a driving van. Their arms were tied behind their backs, and their legs were tied together(That is each having her legs tied together, but not with each other) But they weren't alone, woman in sunglasses from before was also there observing the two. Now that they could see, aside from the sunglesses she also had long brown hair and looked to be in her middle twenties.

"Well look who woken up. Two girls who don't know when to keep out of adults' bussiness." The woman said
"Who are you and why are you doing this?!" Summer yelled
"It doesn't matter who am I, you Summer Salt are here because you need to realize that there's no place for meddling kids like you this town. I believe that after few days in our care, you will be willing to stop your irresponsible amateur sleuthing..." Explained the woman
"Who are you doing that for?! Clown Prince? Pao-Ting?" Said Summer trying fruitlessly to free herself from the ropes.
"Phew, I wouldn't take orders from a lowly criminal or spoiled kid who thinks she owns the world." Said the woman
Summer noted how it was rather odd for someone who seemed to operate outside the law herself to call someone "criminal"... but it didn't give her any idea who could the woman in sunglasses be.
"Just wait when I am out of those ropes..." Said Jamie trying to be threatening while desperately trying to free herself from the ropes as well

"Well... if you are so lively, I guess we can find a better way for you to use that energy." Said the woman, and moved closer to Jamie's feet
"You wouldn't dare..." Said Jamie as the woman started untying her shoes
The woman said nothing as Jamie's shoes came off, leaving her only in her black socks...
"Stop it! From what you said you wanted me, and Jamie just happened to come at wrong time! Leave her alone!" Summer tried to intervene
"Well, she was with you during your amateur investigations, wasn't she? This way you will also learn that your actions have consequences even for your friends..." The woman said ominously
Then the woman in glasses moved one of her nails up Jamie's socket foot, eliciting a giggle from the girl.

"I wonder if your friend is just as ticklish as you, Summer Salt..." The woman said, grabbing the tip of one of Jamie's socks and pulling it off
Jamie's feet were a bit bigger than Summer's, since she was also a bit taller than her, her sole was looking smooth and she had nice long toes, just begging to be tickled... ironically the toes were also her most ticklish spot.

A moment later Jamie felt the woman's nails raking up and down her sole, making her giggle at first, but the giggling quickly was intensifying and turning into laughing...
"DOAHAHAHAH YOUHOHOR WOHOHOHORST!" Yelled Jamie as she started to laugh out loud, when the woman started to tickle undersides of her toes

Summer felt terrible having to look at her best friend who was trying to help her out sorting things out with her other best friend Chris, but what could she do? Only thing that came to her mind would be asking to be tickled herself instead... and did she really want that?
1411111.title: The beginning of (another)captivity.

choices: An isolated hut on a swamp(With underground bunker where they will stay)
Ruins of a castle(They will be kept in dungeon)
Featherton Manor?!
14111111.content:
The tickling continued for minutes to come. Mysterious woman kept spidering her nails up and down Jamie's soft sole, sometimes going inbetween her sensitive toes, which was just unbearable for the girl.
"Believe me, what I am doing here is for the best of the whole town."The woman said while still keeping up the tickling
"YOHOHOOU SEHEHEHELF-RIGHTEHEHEEHOOHOHOHUS BIHIHIIHITCH! HAHAAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHA" At the moment Jamie insulted her, the woman proceeded to assault her toes even harder
"I wonder one thing though... even though you just told Summer Salt earlier to meet some boy, you almost instantly followed her. Could it be you had second thoughts and wanted to prevent the meeting? Why would that be?" The woman said, clearly much more motivated to tease and torture Jamie after the insult

Just before Jamie could reply, the van had stopped, signifying they reached their destination.
"Well, time for you two to see your new home for next few days." Said the woman
What surprised Jamie right after that, was that the woman actually put her sock and shoes back on for her.
"What? I am not a thief, you can keep your clothes and footwear. They will obviously be taken off many more times in upcoming days, but they will be returned to you." The woman said
It made Summer wonder, why would their kidnapper be so concerned about breaking the law, or working with other criminals... could she be some detective herself? Or a government agent? Or maybe police officer?

The back door of the can opened, by another woman, also wearing sunglesses, but looking younger and having blonde hair tied in a ponytail.
"We reached the place sarge... but, are those really the two we were supposed to take?" The blonde kidnapper looks at Jamie and Summer and seems to have doubts
"Yes, don't question the orders Kaklinsky, and I think I told you to not call me by my rank during this operation." Said the woman in sunglasses
"Sorry sar... I mean ma'am!" Replied the woman called Kaklinsky
"Relax Alice, I understand this is unusual operation. But it has to be done."Said the woman in sunglasses, now calling the other one with first name probably to put her at ease
"Yes ma'am." Said the blonde kidnapper

"So in everyday life they use ranks... and call it an operation... that would suggest either military or police background. But why would someone with a background like that kidnap us? It makes no sense." Thought Summer

After that each of the women took one of the tied girls outside of the van, it was at this moment Summer and Jamie noticed where they had been brought...
14111111.title: Reaching the destination...

choices: They are noticed by one of their captors and took to a tickling session!
They manage to untie their ropes! Time to come up with some plan!
Something else
141111111.content:
The destination turned out to be a small hut located in the middle of Tingling Wetlands, a swamp area to the south of the town. In the following minutes Summer and Jamie were carried inside the hut, which turned out to be surprisingly clean and well furnished compared to how it looked from the outside, could it be that this house was used for more kidnappings in the past? The two women carried the girls down a staircase which appeared after the sunglasses wearing one pressed a few buttons on what seemed like a code locking console. Once they were there, it turned out there was a small underground facility located there. Jamie and Summer were put in a small room that was arranged into a cell, there was a single bed inside it, as well as an empty desk with a chair by it.

"We expected just Summer Salt, so you will have to get by with just one bed somehow." Explained the woman in sunglasses
"You're gonna pay for this!" Said Jamie, who just regained breath after the tickling she went through in the car
"I doubt it. This underground bunker is equipped with sleeping gas spreading system, I can turn it on manually whenever I want, or it turns on automatically if you use wrong code at the console. You will walk free after you are ready to abandon your unsafe hobby, no sooner than that." Explained the woman

With that she undone the ropes at both girls' legs, to allow them to walk around cell freely, and locked the door to it. Finally leaving both Summer and Jamie alone.

"How do I keep getting myself into mess like that..."Said Summer while trying to do something about the still remaining ropes tying her wrists together behind her back
"It's my fault this time, I shouldn't have encouraged you to go talk to Chris like that..." Said Jamie
"No it's not, you had no way of knowing that. And if you didn't go to warn me, who knows if it wouldn't be too late before everyone realized I was gone? I just feel bad for getting you into it like that... that woman tickled you quite a lot back in the van" Said Summer
"Heh, I survived much worse tickling than that! Still, not much good my warning did, we just got captured together." Said Jamie
"Well, as they said, they weren't prepared to capture anyone more than just me. Perhaps it will give us an advantage, which will let us escape and discover who they really are!" Said Summer
"Yeah, there's something weird about those two... and wasn't there more of them earlier? I mean none of those looks like they could hit me in the back of my head, and I am sure that someone did before." Said Jamie
"Well... it seemed like they enlisted help from some criminals we helped to capture in the past. Before they put me to sleep, they started talking something about letting them leave town..." Explained Summer
"Bastards..." Said Jamie
"If I had to bet, they probably have military or police background... nonetheless I have no idea why would someone like that have interest in us." Explained Summer
"Heh, that's just like you Summer being able to deduce quite a lot in such a short time! Now that I think... my dad works at the police station, perhaps he could have some idea, if we managed to contact him, even though I am sure they took our phones... Maybe they fired some detective recently because she had worse results than you?"Said Jamie
"That's possible... still, first we shoud get our hands free. Let's stand back to back and try to untie each other." Said Summer

The girls stood back to back, and started trying to untie each other's ropes, Jamie blushed slightly feeling Summer's hands touch hers... she will have to confess her feelings to her sometime later it seems, it definitely wasn't the time or place for that now.
141111111.title: An isolated hut on a swamp...

choices: Reveal the reason (post your ideas!)
Save it for later, follow Summer instead
1413.title: "It's not going to matter anymore...

choices: A knock at the door (dammit!)
The phone rings (just ignore it)
The entire ceiling fell in
14132.content:
Chris Clove was arranging his old junk. An album from his grandmother, no he was never going to use THAT...A toy gun, no, he got that as a gift from Summer when they first went out ghost-hunting, there was no way he could possibly part with hat...
He was snapped out of his thoughts by knocking at the door

Chris answered it and found a soaked schoolgirl on his doorstep.
"Stupid rain."
Summer Salt spoke up, squeezing rainwoter out of her shirt, making Chris' heart beat faster when he recognized the voice.
"There was no sign of this shower when I spoke to Jamie just ten minutes ago."

"Summer...Why did you come here?"
"I need a reason to visit my friends now? You don't want to see me?"
"NO! I mean, of course not, I just thought..."
"Then why don't you invite me in, or do you want to wait until I'm completely soaked and cold?"

Chris hurried out of the way, and brought some dry clothes and a towel.
Summer, with a relieved sigh, accepted them. They just sat on the bed in silence while Summer wiped the wetness off. Chris as usual was too much in awe to be able to think of anything to converse about.

After another minute of silence after Summer finished wiping and sat back, she suddenly spoke up:

"Chris. Why did you never ask me out?"
It came out of nowhere and left the boy babbling incomprehensibly.

"What? Speak up or I can't understand you."

"Ah...well, we've been spending a lot of time together..."
"Yeah, go on?"

And I never thought...No, if he was honest, it wasn't that that bothered him. He'd have given it a try even if he only had a snowball's chance.

"The truth is...I like to tickle people."
He broke down.
"I can't help it, okay?
And even though we've been running from that all this time...
I always thought I should be trying to protect you, and yet I still think of...
I'm a horrible person."

Summer looked at her shy friend. His honest determination was kind of showing him Chris in a new light.
She squinted, and flipped her hair back.
"Tsk. You should've just come to talk to me about it. Sure, it's torture and it's annoying but it's...it's not like I ALWAYS hated it."

"Like...Remember that time in the mansion, when we were trapped, but you just couldn't help NOT to tickle our feet..."
"Er, I rather hoped you'd have already forgotten that..."
"How could I forget it? I almost died, Chris! Remember when I said that I'd have you properly pay me back for it?"
"Uh oh."
"Indeed . Prepare yourself."
She took a deep breath.
"Your punishment is to confess to me properly this time."
"...Eehh?" o_o
"Well? If you don't I'll bring Jamie over to help, and believe me, she knows how to make people confess."
"Oh. Well, in that case...
Please go out with me."
Summer smirked and let her gaze wonder.
"Yeah, okay."
"Wha-REALLY?"
"Hey, don't open up all your champagne at once, Romeo."

Chris was flabbergasted. He was feeling like he should try to run a quick marathon, but that'd have meant leaving Summer alone which was unthinkable.

Summer was still smiling strangely.
"Well. I guess we should be telling Jamie the good news." She stared at Chris suggestively. "You know. When the rain is over."

"Ah. Okay. So...Could I maybe...Tickle your stomach?"
Summer looked like she was about to laugh once more.

"Yeah okay."

She lay back on the bed and...
14132.title: Summer in the rain

choices: Was in an accident
Will be moving away
Won the lottery and a trip to Vegas! Yippee!
141321.content:
Mouse stood in the door.
"Mom says you have to come home."
(Better not ask how she found out I'm here, Summer groaned.)

Mouse looked at them and clasped her hands

"Omg have you guys been KISSING?"

Summer ruffled Mouse's hair and grinned at Chris.
"Yeah, we might be doing that in the future. Heh.
Hey, here's an idea, why don't we find Jamie and tell her the good news?"

She saw Mouse's blank expression.
"What, did I say something wrong?"

"Oh, didn't you hear? Jamie..."
141321.title: A knock at the door (dammit!)

choices: Clown Prince
Margaret Allspice
Some other villain we don't know yet
141323.content:
"HOW IS THIS EVEN POSSIBLE?" Chris yelled.
Summer, lying back on the remnants of the bed said: "Well it's probably from all the rain..."
"WHAT KIND OF RAIN DOES THAT? No, no. This is my awful luck torturing me and laughing in my face again..."

Summer looked at him as he was angrily stomping around and laughed out cheerfully.

"Chris Clove, you are seriously the unluckiest boy I have ever met! The biggest fuck-up, the butt of fate's every joke..."

"Yeah, yeah, just keep telling me. Don't I know it. Just ONE time I finally get lucky, just once things look like they could go my way and then this..."

Summer hugged him from behind, which confused him.
"Sum-" what should I call her now? "Summer, what is it now?"
""Nothing. It's just warm."
"Look, this is no time for jokes...
"Do I look like I'm joking? In case you forgot, I'm still half-naked and freezing here."

They stood like that for a while, Chris since he was unable to move.

"Am I really a fuck-up?"
"Mmh?" Summer said without opening her eyes.
"I mean, it's not like I'm trying to complain..."
"Mmmhm. That's the best part about you. You don't complain."
"And what is that supposed to mean? Are you saying that I am a push-over?"

"No, no...Chris! Are you angry now? Look...I wasn't trying to toy with you. I know that you are brave, and...honest, and...
I don't know why, but when I'm near you, it's like all my stress just goes away. It's probably from watching you fail so much yet you always try so hard. Is that weird?"

"No, no...That...Isn't weird."

"Well isn't that cute." said a third voice from somewhere above. "Actually, it wasn't cute at all. More like nauseating. How about I give you guys a bit more challenge?"

The interrupted pair looked up to see...

Who the heck is it this time?
141323.title: The entire ceiling fell in

choices: Pao-Ting!!!
Serafine Kawasaki
(somebody else...)
143.content:
"WHAAAT? Since when?"
"Last week."
Summer's face fell.
"And he didn't tell me..."

"Well, he only told me recently." Jamie attempted to excuse it. "Apparently she heard about our adventures, and told him he sounded fascinating...And, well, you know how Chris is..."

Summer stood up.
"I WON'T accept that."
"Er, it's not like there's much we can do..."
"No. If Chris wants to play like that, then I'll...

---
30 minutes later the two were sitting behind a bush near Chris' house.
"Summer" Jamie hissed. "Is spying like this, you know, really okay?"
"We're not spying. We're just...Checking on our friend's safety."
"Ah...Look, it's them..."

"HER?" Summer yelled.

Jamie gasped when Summer just stood up without a care for staying hidden and blocked Chris' path

"Oh...Hey, Summer. Eh? Jamie too?...
Er, I don't know if you've met..."

"Chris! You didn't tell me your girlfriend was..."
143.title: ...He has a girlfriend?

choices: It can't be!!!...
1432.content:
Serafine was one of Summer's less noticeable classmates.
Originally a quiet girl, she was actually a bundle of kinks wrapped up in a cute package, a walking testament to the saying "watch out for the quiet ones".

But to think she'd actually see her again by Chris' side!!!...

"Er...I'm just walking Sera home..."
"Oh, we had a wonderful day!" Serafine chirped. "We went to the amusement park. Christoph told me about the time he saved all of you in the castle..."
"Er, I may have exaggerated a little.."

Summer took a deep breath.
"I'm happy for you! Jamie, we're leaving!"

She stomped off, then ten steps behind the next corner it seemed like all energy suddenly left her.

"She seems like a cute girl." Jamie commented, turning up behind her.
"She never used to be this chatty...Usually she'd be quiet and reserved..."
"Well, at least they seem to match each other nicely."

She looked at Summer's back, then leaned closer and whispered:

"Summer...could it be that you..."
"Eh? No! nothing like that...Jamie - you know the reason too, right?..."

Jamie had to admit that she did. It wasn't that Summer wasn't happy for Chris. It was just, the three of them had been together since they were little. She was just pissed that someone who was not a part of their group was going to be monopolizing Chris from now on and he would no longer hang with them...

"Jamie...Do you think our friends are all drifting apart...?"

"Well, we certainly couldn't have that." said a voice behind them. A voice from the past...
1432.title: Serafine Kawasaki

choices: Absolutely unharmed.
Panting and lying on the ground wasted.
Caught in some kind of trap.
14321.content:
A clown in a colorful tuxedo stood in front of them. He was twirling an umbrella cane and half of his face was covered by a smiling mask.

"YOU!"
Summer gasped for breath.
"YOU!!!"

"Ah, Summer Salt." The Clown Prince said and tapped his nose. "Doing well, I expect?...
I'm always happy to see the soles I've known since they were this little.
Oops, did I say soles?"

"B-But how? Why? We already defeated you! TWICE!"

"Oh, I just decided to drop in and cut short the soppy teenage drama...You think reading about the problems of adolescents is what the readers want? They crave some proper fanservice and I'm here to give it to them."

"What is he saying?" Jamie hissed to Summer.
"He's kind of crazy. He's got this thing, I think it's called meta-awareness..." Summer hissed back.

"So you came back here to defeat me?" Summer said out loud.

"Ah, noh...Nay. I'm not really interested in you this time. There's someone else who really pissed me off who I must meet."

"Someone...other than me?"

"Oh well, I'm sure we'll meet again. Seeya around!"

He fluttered his cape, there was a POOF and some orange smoke, and the Prince was gone.

"Summer, what is happening?" the frozen Jamie asked.

"I'm not sure, but nothing good..."

"But how did he come back? Last time, I was at least ninety percent sure that he had died."

Summer inspected the ground.
"I don't know, but...did you see that?
Teleporting...He couldn't do that before."

"gasp Do you think that he died and became a ghost?"

"I doubt it. THIS" Summer lifted up a feather from the ground. "is unmistakeably real."

She straightened up.
"Well, whatever it is he wants it can't be good. We better warn the others."

"Do you think this is gonna be like one of those crappy horror movies where our friends get picked off one by one..."

"Naaah, surely not..."
But they stared at each other, suddenly not so sure.

Suddenly, they heard a scream. Summer looked up.

"The public park next to the school...The students' dating spot."
They ran.

They arrived just in time to see a young couple...
14321.title: The return of the Prince

info.brief_description: 4th (more romance-heavy) story in the Summer Salt series. (warning: tickle fetish themed!)
info.description:
A slightly older Summer faces new challenges and encounters new friends in her beloved hometown of Hollering Heights.

Previous stories:
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1378124-Mystery-at-Featherton-Manor...
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2089908-Riddle-of-the-Unfair-Tickle...

(no previous knowledge required! Just go crazy and create whatever you like!)

cast of characters:

The Clown Prince: A villain who uses tickling as his weapon of choice and Summer's arch-enemy. He's often followed around by an entourage of Clown Girls, kidnapped girls brainwashed into his servitude through tickling.

Summer Salt: A rookie teen detective. As if Nancy Drew had a tickle fetish.

Susan "Mouse" Salt: Summer's curious younger sister who also loves herself a good adventure. Follows after Summer despite the former's objections.

Pao-Ting: A Chinese teen genius, inventor and Summer's self-appointed rival. Their relationship is...complicated.

Chris (male): Summer's male best friend since kidergarten. Well-meaning but clumsy, and firmly loyal to Summer, who he secretly has a crush on.

Jamie (female): Summer' spirited female friend. "Big sister" figure to the group who likes to play tricks on her friends.

Chris (female): A shy and mousy girl. Though often sidelined by the others, her true determination is revealed as soon as she's the only one left standing.

Jamie (male): A boastful bad boy, the big brother figure of the group.

(as always, Chris and Jamie's genders are picked by the readers.)
